definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
to be a guest or visitor

sentences.english: In 1997, The New Yorker did a profile of trendsetters.
sentences.chinese: 《纽约客》于1997年制作了一份潮人档案。

sentences.english: And the Chanaanite began to dwell with them.
sentences.chinese: 客纳罕人依旧住在这些地方。

sentences.english: Ensure all used amenities are replaced especially laundry bags and laundry lists.
sentences.chinese: 调换所有用过的客用品特别是洗衣袋和洗衣单。

sentences.english: Taobao customers how to make money?
In the garden he was already accepting this load.
sentences.chinese: 在客西马尼园中，他已经预备好领受这一切。

sentences.english: We could say He said no to Christ in Gethsemane.
sentences.chinese: 我们甚至可以说，祂在客西马尼园向耶稣说“不”。

sentences.english: So I said do Taobao off thinking is very important.
sentences.chinese: 所以我才说做淘宝客思路很重要。

sentences.english: I'm currently registered as the New Yorker's Beijing correspondent.
sentences.chinese: 我现在注册的身份是《纽约客》的北京通讯记者。

sentences.english: Lock the pantry door and remember guest supplies are very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 锁上内仓门记住客用品是非常贵的。

sentences.english: Ski then trapped in the air to help 220 passengers ski rescue.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪场随即协助被困在半空中的220名滑雪客脱困。

sentences.english: This made him something of a loner, but he didn't mind.
sentences.chinese: 兰波成了一个独行客，不过他并不在意。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.
sentences.chinese: 喵？好吧，如果你非走不可。再会啰，夜间独行客。

sentences.english: Clean your trolley and refill the guest supplies and linen, empty and clean your vacuum cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 清洁服务车并补充客用品及布草，清理吸尘机。

sentences.english: There was a darker enemy than Judas who was on his way to the Garden.
sentences.chinese: 一个比犹大更黑暗的敌人将来到客西马尼园中。

sentences.english: X number of customers equals X number of dollars in the company's pocket.
sentences.chinese: 有多少客就意味着有多少钱进了公司的口袋。

sentences.english: Tell me, Vrek. Why are you doing this?
sentences.chinese: 乌力客，话我知为何做这些事？

definition: to ask a guest to stay/to detain a guest
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to live in a foreign place/to live somewhere as a guest
